content: the yarn and sizing information given below is for aran weight which was used in the sample shown in the photographs however the pattern includes additional notes for working the hat in any weight yarn to any gauge for any size **yarn** 100g/182yd/166m aran weight single ply or plied yarn **needles & notions** set 4mm/uk8/us6 & 5mm/uk6/us8 dpns/circular or size needed to obtain gauge stitch marker as necessary tapestry needle **sample details** shown in ewemomma merino aran 182yd/166m per 100g 100% merino shown in size 21in/53 25cm on model with 22in/56cm circumference head **gauge** 20sts x 28rows to 4in/10cm on 4mm needles over stocking stitch 20sts x 30rows to 4in/10cm on 4mm needles over twisted rib **sizes** to fit size 15 17 19 21 23 25 in/ 38 43 25 48 25 53 25 58 5 63 5 cm finished size 12 75 14 5 16 17 75 19 25 20 75 in/ 32 5 36 75 40 75 45 49 52 75 cm **skills required** knit & purl sts twisted stitches knitting into the row below **accessibility statement** the pdf for this pattern is colour blind accessible it uses black text on a white background **support** do you need help with this pattern we have a specific discussion thread in the wormhead s hats group 4 where you can ask any questions 1 https //www woollywormhead com/the-woolly-hat-society 2 https //www patreon com/woollywormhead 3 https //www patreon com/woollywormhead 4 https //www ravelry com/discuss/woolly-wormheads-hats/topics/4203374
